item.title: Drop in cancer risk five years after quitting smoking
item.author: Diego F. Nájera,
item.description: A new analysis of the Framingham Heart Study, conducted by a team of researchers led by Hilary Tindle MD, MPH at the Vanderbilt University Medical Centre, has revealed encouraging findings for both current and former smokers. Findings from the Study – which is supported by the National Heart, Lung, …
